data.eml:eml: The phylogeny of pholcid spiders: a critical evaluation of relationships suggested by molecular data (Araneae, Pholcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huber, Bernhard A., Eberle, Jonas, Dimitrov, Dimitar (2018): The phylogeny of pholcid spiders: a critical evaluation of relationships suggested by molecular data (Araneae, Pholcidae). ZooKeys 789: 51-101, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.789.22781, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.789.22781
